titleInfo.title: Mediniet Habuur les debris de L'enteneur

mods.abstract: Hypostyle Hall, Temple of Rameses III at Medinet Habu, West Thebes (New Kingdom Dynasty XX); column bases inscribed with cartouche of Rameses III flanked by uraei, three seated statues near store rooms adorned with engravings of Egyptian motifs (left); crumbling Temple walls (background); "otaeB .A" in white at bottom left corner; "332 Medinet Habu les debris de L'enteneur" in pencil on back of print. (Number on object is 4/697).

titleInfo.title: Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Century Images of Egypt

subject.topic: Temple of Ramses III (Medinet Habu Site, Egypt)

location.physicalLocation: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture
